metadata.title: CVE-2016-6298 on Ubuntu 21.04 (hirsute) - medium.
metadata.description: The _Rsa15 class in the RSA 1.5 algorithm implementation in jwa.py in jwcrypto before 0.3.2 lacks the Random Filling protection mechanism, which makes it easier for remote attackers to obtain cleartext data via a Million Message Attack (MMA).

criterions.comment: python-jwcrypto package in hirsute, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '0.4.2-1').
